channel.title: Staker Logs
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u114/FookItAll/MePwnd1.jpg[/img] Hey, If You don't now, Pwnd,Mr.Chris And I are making stakers :D I'm not telling you the name of the accounts just in case some fucker reports Us!!!!! Note: Mr.Chris started after me and Pwnd, so he's not included in this log! [hr] [b][u]Step 1![/u][/b] Me And Pwnd Went To Port Sarim And Killed Giant rats, and if we needed food we cooked the rat meat we got from drops.. [b][u]Step 2[/u][/b] We went to thieves and killed them, if we needed food we would use giant rat meat, again. [b][u]Step 3[/u][/b] Now we're at monks, killing them, and healing by the cabbages. [b][u]This Is All we are at atm![/u][/b] [hr] Logs For Me! [below] [b]Strength Log[/b] [b]Attack Log[/b] [s]10 str[/s] [s]10 attack[/s] [s]20 str[/s] [s]20 attack[/s] [s]30 str [/s] [s]30 attack[/s] [s][u]40 str [/u] [/s] [s]40 attack[/s] 50 str 50 attack 60 str 60 attack 70 str
[b]I'm getting 40 str now, then 45 str then 45 str, then 50 attack,then 50 str.[/b]
Donations are grateful and very appreciated ScreenPics: [IMG]http://img107.imageshack.us/img107/1923/07mar02210258ci3.png[/img] [IMG]http://img102.imageshack.us/img102/4454/07mar02211125pp6.png[/img]
later, -Ollie [hr] So, like Mr. Chris, I decided to start a Pker/Staker. Anyways, here it is.
[b]Day 1[/b] [img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/3051/day1gf0.png[/img] Finished with full iron, mith scimmy.
[b]Day 2[/b] [img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/2520/day2zd4.png[/img] Same items except addy scimmy now. x] Going to be working on 50 strength before I work on attack. Then get up to 40 attack and go on strength from there. -Pwndy [hr] [red][size=20pt]Mr. Chris is Sold his staker.[/size][red] [IMG]http://img117.imageshack.us/img117/1291/skillsslash212733yu7.png[/img]

item.title: Staker Logs
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

if you catch up with me i have a def pure 70 52 70 70.

Whiskey i dont think you understood what i said, yeah STR pure vs STR pure fights are interesting, but there fucking 50:50’s do you really wanna high stake at such dangerous odds? Def pures like mine make awesome boxers aswell, on average they win more per hour and you can fight a wider selection of rules (so more fights = more cash).

AS for me not liking str pures, I was makign str pures before you even played whiskey, they are old and un-interesting, i ve had a dozen of them.

Read full topic

item.title: Staker Logs
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:64021”]since when do stakers want str? you should be getting defence, thats better
something like
80 atk, 60 str, 80 def[/quote]
Not the go anymore. 70 50 70 used to be good in the past, because you could get torags and wear that against people.
The fight would go at a snail’s pace, but you’d come out on top. You get like one stake in, and the person you smash follows you around for half an hour saying “Don’t stake him he’s got torags!! He’s a scammer!#@%” and the like. It’s really stupid.

The only good staking is high level staking.

Oh, and Whiskey, a lot of people don’t like pures. They 1 item PK with protect item on, and I don’t blame them when they’re as poor as most of them are.

Read full topic

item.title: Staker Logs
item.dc:creator: @Whiskey Whiskey
item.description:
@Whiskey wrote:

[quote=“Hex Key, post:12, topic:62133”][quote author=Whiskey link=topic=89633.msg957601#msg957601 date=1172881527]

1 def pures are usless as pkers. Yeah youl get a few 100k stake, 1 every 30mins or so, but your still fighting alot of 50:50 duels and not very often. There are much more effective cash per hour stakers with less risks and less training time.

My average hour income is about 200 - 300k depending on the world.

Pures suck - why is everyone so obsessed with them? What good is 99 strength if you get hammered before you hit a decent number?

Simple because they can beat people 15 combat levels higher than them.
[/quote]

yeah at stupid rules, like no armour + wep on. Only a retard would fight those rules unless they were STR pure nub aswell.
Wep on, no ammour - is about as challening a str pure to armour on boxing. Its retarded and just cuz they can hit 30 they think they are the l33t shit. They are not, their noobish and get lucky when an absolute idiot duels them.

IMO rangers are kicking ass, they hammer both mage and warrior. the triangle is fucked.[/quote]

Actually, strength pure on strength pure is normally a great fight with a big reward. Heck, I have dueled a level 90 (No, not a dumbass) and lost by about 5 hp with armour off. In fact, a lot of people are willing to fight armour off, weapon off. Although, much of staking is based on luck.

Strength pures will always be better than a lot of higher combat levels. The only reason you, Hex Key, are against them is the fact you dislike them.

Read full topic

item.title: Staker Logs
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Hex Key, post:12, topic:62133”][quote author=Whiskey link=topic=89633.msg957601#msg957601 date=1172881527]

1 def pures are usless as pkers. Yeah youl get a few 100k stake, 1 every 30mins or so, but your still fighting alot of 50:50 duels and not very often. There are much more effective cash per hour stakers with less risks and less training time.

My average hour income is about 200 - 300k depending on the world.

Pures suck - why is everyone so obsessed with them? What good is 99 strength if you get hammered before you hit a decent number?

Simple because they can beat people 15 combat levels higher than them.
[/quote]

yeah at stupid rules, like no armour + wep on. Only a retard would fight those rules unless they were STR pure nub aswell.
Wep on, no ammour - is about as challening a str pure to armour on boxing. Its retarded and just cuz they can hit 30 they think they are the l33t shit. They are not, their noobish and get lucky when an absolute idiot duels them.

IMO rangers are kicking ass, they hammer both mage and warrior. the triangle is fucked.[/quote]
The triangle has never been right. :rolleyes: It’s one extreme to the next.
Last year any mage with ice barrage and ahrims was tearing a ranger to pieces (oh the irony when you’re level 99 range and still getting your ass handed to you on a frozen plate).
This year any ranger with 90+ range and 44+ prayer can KO a person using melee and armour lower then barrows. With a magic shortbow.

Oh, and lets not forget that pking with magic at the mage bank in mystic or ahrims is guaranteed to put you out of pocket, even with the melee prayer on.
The 30K dragon ‘lil bundle o’ death’ dagger is sure to accomplish that.

Read full topic
